description: There is a --dhcp-lease-max option in dnsmasq and it should be used during dnsmasq invocation.
title: Can't run more than 150 instances using DHCP due inadequate dnsmasq defaults

comments.content: There is a --dhcp-lease-max option in dnsmasq and it should be used (preferably configurable via flag) during dnsmasq invocation.
